mapper.select:
SELECT SV1.CNTR_NO || '-' || SV1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_NO_DTL /*계약상세번호*/ , SA2.RCGVP_KNM || (CASE WHEN (SC3.INSI_CST_TP_CD IS NOT NULL AND SC3.CNTRT_REL_CD = '01' AND (SP.CLTN_DT IS NULL OR SP.CLTN_DT <= NVL(SP.RCNTR_DT, '00000000'))) OR SC2.SELL_DSC_DV_CD = '2' THEN '(직원구매)' ELSE '' END ) AS CST_NM /*고객성명*/ , (SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'CST_GD_CD', NVL(MAX(X.CST_GD_CD),0)) FROM TB_SSCT_CST_GD_ESTM_IZ X WHERE 1=1 AND X.CST_NO = CST.CST_NO AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN X.VL_STRT_DTM AND X.VL_END_DTM) AS CST_GD_NM /*고객등급*/ , (SELECT T1.PRTNR_KNM||'('||T1.PRTNR_NO||')' FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CNTR_FXN_PRTNR_IZ T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = SC2.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = SC2.CNTR_SN AND T2.CH_SN = (SELECT MAX(T3.CH_SN) FROM TB_SVPD_CNTR_FXN_PRTNR_IZ T3 WHERE T3.CNTR_NO = SC2.CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = SC2.CNTR_SN) WHERE T1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(T2.FST_RGST_DTM,1,6) AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.FXN_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.FXN_PRTNR_NO AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS FXN_PRTNR_NM /*고정방문자명*/ , NVL2(SA2.LOCARA_TNO, SA2.LOCARA_TNO, '') AS LOCARA_TNO /*전화번호(지역전화번호)*/ , NVL2(SA2.LOCARA_TNO, SA2.EXNO_ENCR, '') AS EXNO_ENCR /*전화번호(전화국번호암호화)*/ , NVL2(SA2.LOCARA_TNO, SA2.IDV_TNO, '') AS IDV_TNO /*전화번호(개별전화번호)*/ , NVL2(SA2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO, SA2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO, '') AS CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대전화번호(휴대지역전화번호)*/ , NVL2(SA2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO, SA2.MEXNO_ENCR, '') AS MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대전화번호(휴대전화국번호암호화)*/ , NVL2(SA2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO, SA2.CRAL_IDV_TNO, '') AS CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대전화번호(휴대개별전화번호)*/ , '('|| NVL(ADR.NEW_ADR_ZIP, ADR.OLD_ADR_ZIP) ||')' || NVL(ADR.RNADR, ADR.LTN_ADR) || ' ' || NVL(ADR.RDADR, ADR.LTN_DTL_ADR)AS ADDR /*주소*/ , SV3.CST_UNUITM_CN /*고객특이사항내용*/ , (SELECT X.PRTNR_KNM||'('||X.PRTNR_NO||')' FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ X WHERE X.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(SV3.FST_RGST_DTM,1,6) AND X.OG_TP_CD = SV3.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = SV3.WK_PRTNR_NO AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS WK_PRTNR_NM /*작성자명*/ , (SELECT X.PRTNR_NO FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ X WHERE X.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(SV3.FST_RGST_DTM,1,6) AND X.OG_TP_CD = SV3.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = SV3.WK_PRTNR_NO AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS WK_PRTNR_NO /*작성자*/ , (SELECT X.OG_TP_CD FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ X WHERE X.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(SV3.FST_RGST_DTM,1,6) AND X.OG_TP_CD = SV3.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = SV3.WK_PRTNR_NO AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS WK_OG_TP_CD /*작성자소속*/ , SV3.FST_RGST_DTM AS WRTE_DT /*작성일시*/ , (SELECT T1.PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 WHERE T1.PD_CD = SC6.BASE_PD_CD ) AS BASE_PD_NM /* 계약상품 */ , (SELECT X.PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS X WHERE X.PD_CD = SV1.PDCT_PD_CD) AS PD_NM /*현재상품*/ , NVL(SC4.FRISU_AS_PTRM_N, 0) AS FRISU_AS_PTRM_N/*무상AS개월수*/ , NVL(SC4.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N, 0) AS FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N/*무상BS개월수*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'PD_USWY_CD', NVL(SV2.PD_USWY_CD,0)) AS PD_USWY /*용도구분*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', NVL(SC2.SELL_TP_CD,0)) AS SELL_TP_NM /*판매유형*/ , (SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', NVL(T1.SELL_TP_CD,0)) FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL T2 ON T2.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T2.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '212' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T2.VL_STRT_DTM AND T2.VL_END_DTM WHERE T2.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO = SC2.CNTR_NO AND T2.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN = SC2.CNTR_SN ) AS SV_TP_NM /*관리유형*/ , SUBSTR(SC1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM,1,8) AS CNTR_DT /*계약일자*/ , NVL2(O1.HOO_PRTNR_NO, O1.OG_CD, '') AS OG_CD/*지점코드*/ , NVL2(O1.HOO_PRTNR_NO, O1.HOO_PRTNR_NO, '') AS BRMGR_PRTNR_NO /*지점장사번*/ , NVL2(O1.HOO_PRTNR_NO, O1.HOO_PRTNR_NM, '') AS BRMGR_PRTNR_NM /*지점장*/ , (SELECT MAX(NVL(T1.ASN_DT, '')) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ T1 WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = SV1.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = SV1.CNTR_SN AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '1' ) AS ASN_DT /*배정일자*/ , (SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_CHNL_DV_CD', NVL(X.SELL_CHNL_DV_CD,0)) FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS X WHERE X.OG_TP_CD = SP.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = SP.PRTNR_NO) AS SELL_CHNL /*판매채널*/ , SP.PRTNR_NO /*판매자사번*/ , SP.PRTNR_KNM /*판매자*/ , (SELECT X.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO || '-' || X.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL X WHERE X.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO = SV1.CNTR_NO AND X.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN = SV1.CNTR_SN AND X.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '212' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN X.VL_STRT_DTM AND X.VL_END_DTM AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS BF_CNTR_NO /*전상대코드*/ , (SELECT X.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO || '-' || X.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL X WHERE X.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO = SV1.CNTR_NO AND X.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN = SV1.CNTR_SN AND X.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '212' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN X.VL_STRT_DTM AND X.VL_END_DTM AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N')AS AF_CNTR_NO /*후상대코드*/ , SV1.IST_DT /*설치일자*/ , SV1.CHNG_DT /*교체일자*/ , (SELECT MAX(NVL(SUBSTR(X.HIST_STRT_DTM,1,8), '')) FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL_STAT_CH_HIST X /* 계약상세상태변경이력 */ WHERE SV1.CNTR_NO = X.CNTR_NO AND SV1.CNTR_SN = X.CNTR_SN AND SUBSTR(X.HIST_END_DTM,1,8) = '99991231' AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND X.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '303' ) AS CAN_DT /*취소일자*/ , (SELECT MAX(NVL(SUBSTR(X.HIST_STRT_DTM,1,8), '')) FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL_STAT_CH_HIST X /* 계약상세상태변경이력 */ WHERE SV1.CNTR_NO = X.CNTR_NO AND SV1.CNTR_SN = X.CNTR_SN AND SUBSTR(X.HIST_END_DTM,1,8) = '99991231' AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND X.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '202' ) AS SV_STP_DT /*중지일자*/
, (CASE WHEN SV1.IST_DT IS NOT NULL AND TO_NUMBER(SV1.IST_DT) != 0 THEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SV1.IST_DT,NVL(SC4.FRISU_AS_PTRM_N,0)),'YYYYMMDD') ELSE '' END) AS AS_EXPR_DT /*AS만기*/ , (CASE WHEN SV1.IST_DT IS NOT NULL AND TO_NUMBER(SV1.IST_DT) != 0 THEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SV1.IST_DT,NVL(SC4.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N,0)),'YYYYMMDD') ELSE '' END) AS BS_EXPR_DT /*BS만기*/ , SV1.CPS_DT /*기변일자 - 보상일자*/ , SV1.REQD_DT /*철거일자*/
, (SELECT MIN(T2.CNTR_PD_STRTDT) FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN AND T2.SELL_TP_CD = '3' WHERE T1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO = SC2.CNTR_NO AND T1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN = SC2.CNTR_SN AND T1.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '212') AS MSH_J_DT /*멤버십시작일*/ -- 계약에서 찾기 , (SELECT MAX(T2.CNTR_PD_ENDDT) FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN AND T2.SELL_TP_CD = '3' AND SUBSTR(T2.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD,1,1) IN ('3','4') -- 해약,종료인 것만 WHERE T1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO = SC2.CNTR_NO AND T1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN = SC2.CNTR_SN AND T1.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '212') AS MSH_WDWAL_DT /*멤버십종료일*/ -- 계약에서 찾기
, SV1.BC_NO /*바코드*/ , SV2.BC_NO AS PBL_BC_NO /*발행바코드*/ , SV1.QRS_RDM_NO /*맞춤가이드 - 랜덤QR번호*/ , SV1.SS_PDCT_BC_NO /*삼성제조번호*/ , (SELECT MAX(T1.SPP_IVC_NO) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ T1 WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = SV1.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = SV1.CNTR_SN AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS IVC_NO /*송장번호*/ , (SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELL', 'SV_VST_PRD_CD',X.PD_PRP_VAL02) FROM TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL X WHERE X.PD_CD = SV1.SV_PD_CD AND X.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'SCHD' AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS VST_PRD_NM /* 방문주기1 */ , (SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELL', 'SV_VST_PRD_CD',X.PD_PRP_VAL03) FROM TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL X WHERE X.PD_CD = SV1.SV_PD_CD AND X.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'SCHD' AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS PRD_NM /* 방문주기2 */ FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ SV1 /*고객서비스 수행내역*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_PD_BC_RPBL_CST_IZ SV2 /*상품바코드재발행고객내역*/ ON SV2.CNTR_NO = SV1.CNTR_NO AND SV2.CNTR_SN = SV1.CNTR_SN AND SV2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SV2.PBL_DT = (SELECT MAX(X.PBL_DT) FROM TB_SVPD_PD_BC_RPBL_CST_IZ X WHERE X.CNTR_NO = SV1.CNTR_NO AND X.CNTR_SN = SV1.CNTR_SN AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CNTR_CST_UNUITM_DTL SV3 /*계약고객특이사항상세*/ ON SV3.CNTR_NO = SV1.CNTR_NO AND SV3.CNTR_SN = SV1.CNTR_SN AND SV3.DTL_SN = (SELECT MAX(X.DTL_SN) FROM TB_SVPD_CNTR_CST_UNUITM_DTL X WHERE X.CNTR_NO = SV1.CNTR_NO AND X.CNTR_SN = SV1.CNTR_SN AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AND SV3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS SC1 /*계약기본*/ ON SC1.CNTR_NO = SV1.CNTR_NO AND SC1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL SC2 /*계약상세*/ ON SC2.CNTR_NO = SV1.CNTR_NO AND SC2.CNTR_SN = SV1.CNTR_SN AND SC2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_CST_REL SC3 /*계약고객관계*/ ON SC3.DTL_CNTR_NO = SC2.CNTR_NO AND SC3.DTL_CNTR_SN = SC2.CNTR_SN AND SC3.CNTR_CST_REL_TP_CD = '10' /* 계약자 */ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN SC3.VL_STRT_DTM AND SC3.VL_END_DTM AND SC3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL SC4 /*계약WELLS상세*/ ON SC4.CNTR_NO = SV1.CNTR_NO AND SC4.CNTR_SN = SV1.CNTR_SN AND SC4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS CST /*고객기본*/ ON CST.CST_NO = SC3.CST_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL SA1 /*계약주소관계 - 계약주소*/ ON SA1.DTL_CNTR_NO = SC2.CNTR_NO AND SA1.DTL_CNTR_SN = SC2.CNTR_SN AND SA1.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN SA1.VL_STRT_DTM AND SA1.VL_END_DTM AND SA1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS SA2 /*계약주소지기본*/ ON SA2.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = SA1.CNTR_ADRPC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS ADR /*주소기본*/ ON ADR.ADR_ID = SA2.ADR_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL SC6 /*계약상품관계*/ ON SC6.CNTR_PD_REL_ID = (SELECT MAX(X.CNTR_PD_REL_ID) FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL X WHERE X.CNTR_NO = SC2.CNTR_NO AND X.CNTR_SN = SC2.CNTR_SN AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN X.VL_STRT_DTM AND X.VL_END_DTM ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ SP /* 월파트너내역 -판매파트너*/ ON SP.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(SC1.CNTR_RCP_FSH_DTM,1,6) AND SP.OG_TP_CD = SC1.SELL_OG_TP_CD AND SP.PRTNR_NO = SC1.SELL_PRTNR_NO AND SP.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O1 /*월조직내역*/ ON SP.BASE_YM = O1.BASE_YM AND SP.OG_ID = O1.OG_ID WHERE 1=1
AND SV1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND SV1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}
AND NVL(SV1.BC_NO, SV2.BC_NO) = #{bcNo} AND (SV1.CNTR_NO, SV1.CNTR_SN) = (SELECT A.CNTR_NO , A.CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL A WHERE A.CNTR_NO = NVL((SELECT X.CNTR_NO FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS X WHERE X.CNTR_CNFM_DTM = (SELECT MAX(Y.CNTR_CNFM_DTM) FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS Y WHERE Y.CNTR_NO IN (SELECT Z.CNTR_NO FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ Z WHERE Z.BC_NO = #{bcNo}) ) AND X.CNTR_NO IN (SELECT Y.CNTR_NO FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ Y WHERE Y.BC_NO = #{bcNo}) AND ROWNUM = 1), (SELECT X.CNTR_NO FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS X WHERE X.CNTR_CNFM_DTM = (SELECT MAX(Y.CNTR_CNFM_DTM) FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS Y WHERE Y.CNTR_NO IN (SELECT Z.CNTR_NO FROM TB_SVPD_PD_BC_RPBL_CST_IZ Z WHERE Z.BC_NO = #{bcNo}) ) AND X.CNTR_NO IN (SELECT Y.CNTR_NO FROM TB_SVPD_PD_BC_RPBL_CST_IZ Y WHERE Y.BC_NO = #{bcNo}) AND ROWNUM = 1) ) AND A.CNTR_SN = NVL((SELECT X.CNTR_SN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ X WHERE X.CNTR_NO = (SELECT X.CNTR_NO FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS X WHERE X.CNTR_CNFM_DTM = (SELECT MAX(Y.CNTR_CNFM_DTM) FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS Y WHERE Y.CNTR_NO IN (SELECT Z.CNTR_NO FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ Z WHERE Z.BC_NO = #{bcNo}) ) AND X.CNTR_NO IN (SELECT Y.CNTR_NO FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ Y WHERE Y.BC_NO = #{bcNo}) AND X.BC_NO = #{bcNo} AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ), (SELECT X.CNTR_SN FROM TB_SVPD_PD_BC_RPBL_CST_IZ X WHERE X.CNTR_NO = (SELECT X.CNTR_NO FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS X WHERE X.CNTR_CNFM_DTM = (SELECT MAX(Y.CNTR_CNFM_DTM) FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS Y WHERE Y.CNTR_NO IN (SELECT Z.CNTR_NO FROM TB_SVPD_PD_BC_RPBL_CST_IZ Z WHERE Z.BC_NO = #{bcNo}) ) AND X.CNTR_NO IN (SELECT Y.CNTR_NO FROM TB_SVPD_PD_BC_RPBL_CST_IZ Y WHERE Y.BC_NO = #{bcNo}) AND X.BC_NO = #{bcNo} AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) ) )
AND SV1.CNTR_NO = (SELECT T1.CNTR_NO FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ T1 WHERE T1.SPP_IVC_NO = #{sppIvcNo} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AND SV1.CNTR_SN = (SELECT MAX(T1.CNTR_SN) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ T1 WHERE T1.SPP_IVC_NO = #{sppIvcNo} AND T1.CNTR_NO = SV1.CNTR_NO AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N')

SELECT SV1.SV_HSHD_NO /*가구화코드*/ , SV1.CNTR_NO || '-' || SV1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL /*계약상세번호*/ , SA2.RCGVP_KNM AS CST_NM /*고객명*/ , (SELECT X.PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS X WHERE X.PD_CD = SV1.PDCT_PD_CD) AS PD_NM /*상품명*/ , NVL2(SA2.LOCARA_TNO, SA2.LOCARA_TNO, '') AS LOCARA_TNO /*전화번호(지역전화번호)*/ , NVL2(SA2.LOCARA_TNO, SA2.EXNO_ENCR, '') AS EXNO_ENCR /*전화번호(전화국번호암호화)*/ , NVL2(SA2.LOCARA_TNO, SA2.IDV_TNO, '') AS IDV_TNO /*전화번호(개별전화번호)*/ , NVL2(SA2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO, SA2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO, '') AS CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대전화번호(휴대지역전화번호)*/ , NVL2(SA2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO, SA2.MEXNO_ENCR, '') AS MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대전화번호(휴대전화국번호암호화)*/ , NVL2(SA2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO, SA2.CRAL_IDV_TNO, '') AS CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대전화번호(휴대개별전화번호)*/ FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ SV1/*서비스수행내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL SA1 /*계약주소관계*/ ON SV1.CNTR_NO = SA1.DTL_CNTR_NO AND SV1.CNTR_SN = SA1.DTL_CNTR_SN AND SA1.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS SA2 /*계약주소지기본*/ ON SA1.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = SA2.CNTR_ADRPC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ SV2 ON SV1.CNTR_NO = SV2.CNTR_NO AND SV1.CNTR_SN = SV2.CNTR_SN AND SV2.MNGT_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') WHERE SV1.SV_HSHD_NO = (SELECT X.SV_HSHD_NO FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ X WHERE X.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND X.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}) AND SV1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND SV1.CPS_DT IS NULL AND SV2.MSH_WDWAL_DT IS NULL AND SV2.CAN_DT IS NULL AND SV1.SV_HSHD_NO IS NOT NULL ORDER BY SV1.CNTR_NO, SV1.CNTR_SN

SELECT GUBUN /*구분*/ , CNTC_DT/*등록일시*/ , ABSNC_RSON_KIND/*컨택그룹*/ , ABSNC_RSON/*컨택구분*/ , OG_TP_CD/*소속*/ , PRTNR_NO/*사번*/ , PRTNR_NM/*성명*/ , CNTC_CN/*컨택상세*/ , CST_SV_ASN_NO /*배정번호*/
, CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN FROM ( (SELECT 'AS' GUBUN /*구분*/ , S1.CNTC_DT || S1.CNTC_HH AS CNTC_DT/*등록일시*/ , DECODE(SUBSTR(S1.ABSNC_RSON_CD,1,1), '0', '컨택완료' , '1', '고객부재' , '2', '방문불가' , '3', '고객이관' , '') AS ABSNC_RSON_KIND /*컨택그룹*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'ABSNC_RSON_CD', NVL(S1.ABSNC_RSON_CD,0)) AS ABSNC_RSON /*컨택구분*/ , DECODE (P1.OG_TP_CD, 'W06', P1.OG_NM, P1.OG_CD) AS OG_TP_CD /*소속*/ , NVL(P1.PRTNR_NO, S1.PRTNR_NO) AS PRTNR_NO /*사번*/ , P1.PRTNR_KNM AS PRTNR_NM /*성명*/ , S1.CNTC_CN /*컨택상세*/ , S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO /*배정번호*/
, S2.CNTR_NO , S2.CNTR_SN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_CNTC_IZ S1 /*고객서비스접톡내역*/ INNER JOIN (SELECT WK_ACPTE_DT , WK_ACPTE_HH , CST_SV_ASN_NO , WK_PRTNR_NO , WK_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , ASN_DT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ )S2 ON S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = S2.CST_SV_ASN_NO
INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ P1 ON P1.PRTNR_NO = S2.WK_PRTNR_NO AND P1.OG_TP_CD = S2.WK_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND P1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(S2.CST_SV_ASN_NO, 2,6) AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND SUBSTR( S2.CST_SV_ASN_NO, 0, 1) IN ('1','3') ) UNION ALL (SELECT 'BS' GUBUN /*구분*/ , S1.CNTC_DT || S1.CNTC_HH AS CNTC_DT/*등록일시*/ , DECODE(SUBSTR(S1.ABSNC_RSON_CD,1,1), '0', '컨택완료' , '1', '고객부재' , '2', '방문불가' , '3', '고객이관' , '') AS ABSNC_RSON_KIND /*컨택그룹*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'ABSNC_RSON_CD', NVL(S1.ABSNC_RSON_CD,0)) AS ABSNC_RSON /*컨택구분*/ , DECODE (P1.OG_TP_CD, 'W06', P1.OG_NM, P1.OG_CD) AS OG_TP_CD /*소속*/ , NVL(P1.PRTNR_NO, S1.PRTNR_NO) AS PRTNR_NO /*사번*/ , P1.PRTNR_KNM AS PRTNR_NM /*성명*/ , S1.CNTC_CN /*컨택상세*/ , S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO /*배정번호*/
, S2.CNTR_NO , S2.CNTR_SN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_CNTC_IZ S1 /*고객서비스접톡내역*/ INNER JOIN (SELECT CNFM_PSIC_ASN_DT , CNFM_PSIC_ASN_HH , CST_SV_ASN_NO , CNTC_ICHR_PRTNR_NO , CNTC_ICHR_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD , ASN_OJ_YM , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , CST_CNTC_DT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ ) S2 ON S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = S2.CST_SV_ASN_NO
INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ P1 ON P1.PRTNR_NO = S2.CNTC_ICHR_PRTNR_NO AND P1.OG_TP_CD = S2.CNTC_ICHR_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND P1.BASE_YM = S2.ASN_OJ_YM AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND SUBSTR( S2.CST_SV_ASN_NO, 1, 1) = '2' ) ) WHERE 1=1 AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} ORDER BY CNTC_DT DESC, CST_SV_ASN_NO DESC

SELECT GUBUN , SV_TP /*유형*/ , RCP_DT /*접수(배정)일자*/ , SV_BIZ_DCLSF /*접수(배정)내역*/ , REQ_DT /*요청약속일자*/ , (CASE WHEN PROC_STUS = '20' THEN VST_FSH_DT ELSE '' END) AS VST_FSH_DT /*처리일자*/ , WK_PRGS_STAT /*처리결과*/ , AS_CAUS /*처리내역*/ , RTNGD_PROCS_TP /*반품처리정보*/ , FST_VST_FSH_DT /*폐기일자:출고확인일자*/ , ZIP_NO /*우편번호*/ , OG_TP /*구분(담당자)*/ , OG_NM /*소속(담당자)*/ , PRTNR_NO /*사번(담당자)*/ , PRTNR_NM /*성명(담당자)*/ , CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대지역전화번호(담당자)*/ , MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대전화국번호암호화(담당자)*/ , CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대개별전화번호(담당자)*/ , BLD_NM /*소속빌딩(담당자)*/ , BC_NO /*작업시바코드*/ , IMG_YN /*사진*/ , IST_ENVR_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치환경사진경로*/ , IST_KIT_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치키드사진경로*/ , IST_CELNG_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치천장사진경로*/ , ASN_DT /*배정일자*/ , CST_SV_ASN_NO /*배정번호*/ , PROC_STUS /*작업진행상태*/ , CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , SV_HSHD_NO /*가구화번호*/ , SV_HSHD_NO_CNT /*가구화CNT*/ , SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD /*서비스대분류코드*/ , SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD /*서비스세분류코드*/ , TAIK_YN /*배송여부*/ FROM ( (/*A/S작업완료 건*/ SELECT /*+ LEADING(SV1) USE_NL(SV1 SV2 SV3 SV4 P1) INDEX(SV4 PK_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ) */ 'AD' GUBUN , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD', DECODE(SV1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD,'9',1,SV1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD)) AS SV_TP /*유형*/ , SV2.EGER_ASN_DT || SV2.EGER_ASN_HH AS RCP_DT /*접수(배정)일자*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', SV1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD) AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF /*접수(배정)내역*/ , SV2.VST_CNFMDT || SV2.VST_CNFM_HH AS REQ_DT /*요청약속일자*/ , SV1.VST_FSH_DT || SV1.VST_FSH_HH AS VST_FSH_DT /*처리일자*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WK_PRGS_STAT_CD', SV1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD) AS WK_PRGS_STAT /*처리결과*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'AS_CAUS_CD', SV1.AS_CAUS_CD) AS AS_CAUS /*처리내역*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RTNGD_PROCS_TP_CD', SV4.RTNGD_PROCS_TP_CD) AS RTNGD_PROCS_TP /*반품처리정보*/ , SV4.OSTR_CONF_DT AS FST_VST_FSH_DT/*폐기일자:출고확인일자*/ , (SELECT NVL(X.NEW_ADR_ZIP, X.OLD_ADR_ZIP) FROM TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS X WHERE X.ADR_ID = SV3.ADR_ID) AS ZIP_NO /*우편번호*/ , NVL2(P1.OG_TP_CD, F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MNGR_DV_CD', DECODE(P1.OG_TP_CD, 'W06', '2','1')), '') AS OG_TP /*구분(담당자)*/ , CASE WHEN P1.OG_TP_CD = 'W06' THEN P1.OG_NM ELSE P1.OG_CD END AS OG_NM /*소속(담당자)*/ , NVL(P1.PRTNR_NO, SV1.PRTNR_NO) AS PRTNR_NO/*사번(담당자)*/ , P1.PRTNR_KNM AS PRTNR_NM /*성명(담당자)*/ , (SELECT X.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS X WHERE X.OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = P1.PRTNR_NO) AS CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대지역전화번호(담당자)*/ , (SELECT X.MEXNO_ENCR FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS X WHERE X.OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = P1.PRTNR_NO) AS MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대전화국번호암호화(담당자)*/ , (SELECT X.CRAL_IDV_TNO FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS X WHERE X.OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = P1.PRTNR_NO) AS CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대개별전화번호(담당자)*/ , '' AS BLD_NM /*소속빌딩(담당자)*/ , SV1.BC_NO /*작업시바코드*/ , (CASE WHEN SV1.IST_ENVR_PHO_PH_DOC_ID IS NOT NULL OR SV1.IST_KIT_PHO_PH_DOC_ID IS NOT NULL OR SV1.IST_CELNG_PHO_PH_DOC_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' END) AS IMG_YN /*사진*/ , NVL(SV1.IST_ENVR_PHO_PH_DOC_ID, '') AS IST_ENVR_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치환경사진경로*/ , NVL(SV1.IST_KIT_PHO_PH_DOC_ID, '') AS IST_KIT_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치키드사진경로*/ , NVL(SV1.IST_CELNG_PHO_PH_DOC_ID, '') AS IST_CELNG_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치천장사진경로*/ , '' AS ASN_DT /*배정일자*/ , SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO /*배정번호*/ , '20' AS PROC_STUS /*작업진행상태*/ , SV1.CNTR_NO , SV1.CNTR_SN , T4.SV_HSHD_NO , 0 AS SV_HSHD_NO_CNT , SV1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , SV1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , CASE WHEN SV2.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD IN ('1112','1113','3460') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS TAIK_YN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ SV1/*고객서비스작업결과내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ SV2 /*고객서비스AS설치배정내역*/ ON SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = SV2.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ SV3 /*고객서비스AS설치대상내역*/ ON SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = SV3.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND SV1.CNTR_NO = SV3.CNTR_NO AND SV1.CNTR_SN = SV3.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ SV4 /*서비스작업출고내역*/ ON SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = SV4.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND SV4.WK_OSTR_SN = (SELECT MAX(X.WK_OSTR_SN) FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ X WHERE X.CNTR_NO = SV4.CNTR_NO AND X.CNTR_SN = SV4.CNTR_SN) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ SV5 /*월별고객서비스대상내역*/ ON SV1.CNTR_NO = SV5.CNTR_NO AND SV1.CNTR_SN = SV5.CNTR_SN AND SUBSTR(SV1.VST_FSH_DT, 1, 6) = SV5.MNGT_YM LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ P1 ON P1.PRTNR_NO = NVL(SV2.WK_PRTNR_NO, SV1.PRTNR_NO) AND P1.OG_TP_CD = NVL(SV2.WK_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD, SV1.OG_TP_CD) AND P1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(SV1.VST_FSH_DT,0,6) INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T4 /*고객서비스수행내역*/ ON SV1.CNTR_NO = T4.CNTR_NO AND SV1.CNTR_SN = T4.CNTR_SN WHERE 1=1 AND (CASE WHEN SV1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '9' THEN '1' ELSE SV1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD END) = SV2.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD AND SV1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD IN ('1','3','4', '9') AND (SV1.URGT_DV_CD !='9' OR SV1.URGT_DV_CD IS NULL) AND SV1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) UNION ALL (/*B/S작업완료 건*/ SELECT /*+ LEADING(SV1) USE_NL(SV1 SV2 SV3 SV4 P1) INDEX(SV4 PK_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ) */ 'BD' GUBUN , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD', SV1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD) AS SV_TP /*유형*/ , SV2.CNFM_PSIC_ASN_DT || SV2.CNFM_PSIC_ASN_HH AS RCP_DT /*접수(배정)일자*/ , TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(SV2.ASN_OJ_YM,5,2)) || '월BS' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', SV1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD) AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF /*접수(배정)내역*/ , SV2.VST_CNFMDT || SV2.VST_CNFM_HH AS REQ_DT /*요청약속일자*/ , SV1.VST_FSH_DT || SV1.VST_FSH_HH AS VST_FSH_DT /*처리일자*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WK_PRGS_STAT_CD', SV1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD) AS WK_PRGS_STAT /*처리결과*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'AS_CAUS_CD', SV1.AS_CAUS_CD) AS AS_CAUS /*처리내역*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RTNGD_PROCS_TP_CD', SV4.RTNGD_PROCS_TP_CD) AS RTNGD_PROCS_TP /*반품처리정보*/ , SV4.OSTR_CONF_DT AS FST_VST_FSH_DT/*폐기일자:출고확인일자*/ , (SELECT NVL(X.NEW_ADR_ZIP, X.OLD_ADR_ZIP) FROM TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS X WHERE X.ADR_ID = SV3.ADR_ID) AS ZIP_NO /*우편번호*/ , NVL2(P1.OG_TP_CD, F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MNGR_DV_CD', DECODE(P1.OG_TP_CD, 'W06', '2','1')), '') AS OG_TP /*구분(담당자)*/ , CASE WHEN P1.OG_TP_CD = 'W06' THEN P1.OG_NM ELSE P1.OG_CD END AS OG_NM /*소속(담당자)*/ , P1.PRTNR_NO AS PRTNR_NO /*사번(담당자)*/ , P1.PRTNR_KNM AS PRTNR_NM /*성명(담당자)*/ , (SELECT CASE WHEN P1.PRTNR_NO = '99992' THEN '1588-4113' ELSE X.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO END FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS X WHERE X.OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = P1.PRTNR_NO) AS CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대지역전화번호(담당자)*/ , (SELECT CASE WHEN P1.PRTNR_NO = '99992' THEN '' ELSE X.MEXNO_ENCR END FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS X WHERE X.OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = P1.PRTNR_NO) AS MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대전화국번호암호화(담당자)*/ , (SELECT CASE WHEN P1.PRTNR_NO = '99992' THEN '' ELSE X.CRAL_IDV_TNO END FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS X WHERE X.OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = P1.PRTNR_NO) AS CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대개별전화번호(담당자)*/ , (SELECT X.BLD_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ X WHERE X.OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND X.OG_CD = P1.OG_CD AND X.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(SV1.VST_FSH_DT, 1, 6) ) AS BLD_NM /*소속빌딩(담당자)*/ , SV1.BC_NO /*작업시바코드*/ , (CASE WHEN SV1.IST_ENVR_PHO_PH_DOC_ID IS NOT NULL OR SV1.IST_KIT_PHO_PH_DOC_ID IS NOT NULL OR SV1.IST_CELNG_PHO_PH_DOC_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' END) AS IMG_YN /*사진*/ , NVL(SV1.IST_ENVR_PHO_PH_DOC_ID, '') AS IST_ENVR_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치환경사진경로*/ , NVL(SV1.IST_KIT_PHO_PH_DOC_ID, '') AS IST_KIT_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치키드사진경로*/ , NVL(SV1.IST_CELNG_PHO_PH_DOC_ID, '') AS IST_CELNG_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치천장사진경로*/ , SV1.ASN_DT AS ASN_DT /*배정일자*/ , SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO /*배정번호*/ , SV2.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD AS PROC_STUS /*작업진행상태*/ , SV1.CNTR_NO , SV1.CNTR_SN , T4.SV_HSHD_NO , 0 AS SV_HSHD_NO_CNT , SV1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , SV1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , CASE WHEN SV3.VST_DV_CD = '20' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS TAIK_YN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ SV1/*고객서비스작업결과내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ SV2 /*고객서비스BS배정내역*/ ON SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = SV2.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ SV3 /*고객서비스BS대상내역*/ ON SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = SV3.CST_SV_ASN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ SV4 /*서비스작업출고내역*/ ON SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = SV4.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND SV4.WK_OSTR_SN = (SELECT MAX(X.WK_OSTR_SN) FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ X WHERE X.CNTR_NO = SV4.CNTR_NO AND X.CNTR_SN = SV4.CNTR_SN) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ SV5 /*월별고객서비스대상내역*/ ON SV1.CNTR_NO = SV5.CNTR_NO AND SV1.CNTR_SN = SV5.CNTR_SN AND SUBSTR(SV1.VST_FSH_DT, 1, 6) = SV5.MNGT_YM LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ P1 ON P1.PRTNR_NO = NVL(SV2.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO, SV1.PRTNR_NO) AND P1.OG_TP_CD = NVL(SV2.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD, SV1.OG_TP_CD) AND P1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(SV1.VST_FSH_DT,0,6) INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T4 /*고객서비스수행내역*/ ON SV1.CNTR_NO = T4.CNTR_NO AND SV1.CNTR_SN = T4.CNTR_SN WHERE 1=1 AND SV1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) UNION ALL (/*A/S작업 미완료 건*/ SELECT /*+ LEADING(SV1) USE_NL(SV1 SV2 SV3 P1) INDEX(SV2 IX_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ_02) */ 'AY' GUBUN , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD', SV1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD) AS SV_TP /*유형*/ , SV1.EGER_ASN_DT || SV1.EGER_ASN_HH AS RCP_DT /*접수(배정)일자*/ , (CASE WHEN SV3.CNSL_DTLP_TP_CD IS NULL THEN F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', SV1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD) ELSE (/*S4.CNSL_DTLP_TP_CD*/ SELECT X.CNSL_TP_LCSF_CD_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_CLASS_C X /*상담분류(소)*/ WHERE X.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD = SV3.CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD AND X.CNSL_TP_MCSF_CD = SV3.CNSL_TP_MCLSF_CD AND X.CNSL_TP_LCSF_CD = SV3.CNSL_TP_LCLSF_CD AND X.JOB_CD = 'L001' ) END) AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF /*접수(배정)내역*/ , SV1.VST_DUEDT || SV1.VST_EXP_HH AS REQ_DT /*요청약속일자*/ , (CASE WHEN SV1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('71', '72', '73') THEN SV1.WK_EXCN_DT || SV1.WK_EXCN_HH ELSE '' END) AS VST_FSH_DT /*처리일자*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WK_PRGS_STAT_CD', SV1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD) AS WK_PRGS_STAT /*처리결과*/ , (CASE WHEN SV1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('71', '72', '73') THEN SV1.WK_CAN_MO_CN ELSE '' END) AS AS_CAUS /*처리내역*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RTNGD_PROCS_TP_CD', SV2.RTNGD_PROCS_TP_CD) AS RTNGD_PROCS_TP /*반품처리정보*/ , SV2.OSTR_CONF_DT AS FST_VST_FSH_DT/*폐기일자:출고확인일자*/ , (SELECT NVL(X.NEW_ADR_ZIP, X.OLD_ADR_ZIP) FROM TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS X WHERE X.ADR_ID = SV3.ADR_ID) AS ZIP_NO /*우편번호*/ , NVL2(P1.OG_TP_CD, F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MNGR_DV_CD', DECODE(P1.OG_TP_CD, 'W06', '2','1')), '') AS OG_TP /*구분(담당자)*/ , CASE WHEN P1.OG_TP_CD = 'W06' THEN P1.OG_NM ELSE P1.OG_CD END AS OG_NM /*소속(담당자)*/ , P1.PRTNR_NO AS PRTNR_NO /*사번(담당자)*/ , P1.PRTNR_KNM AS PRTNR_NM /*성명(담당자)*/ , (SELECT X.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS X WHERE X.OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = P1.PRTNR_NO) AS CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대지역전화번호(담당자)*/ , (SELECT X.MEXNO_ENCR FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS X WHERE X.OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = P1.PRTNR_NO) AS MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대전화국번호암호화(담당자)*/ , (SELECT X.CRAL_IDV_TNO FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS X WHERE X.OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = P1.PRTNR_NO) AS CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대개별전화번호(담당자)*/ , (SELECT X.BLD_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ X WHERE X.OG_ID = P1.OG_ID AND X.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO,2,6)) AS BLD_NM /*소속빌딩(담당자)*/ , '' AS BC_NO /*작업시바코드*/ , '' AS IMG_YN /*사진*/ , '' AS IST_ENVR_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치환경사진경로*/ , '' AS IST_KIT_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치키드사진경로*/ , '' AS IST_CELNG_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치천장사진경로*/ , '' AS ASN_DT /*배정일자*/ , SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO /*배정번호*/ , SV1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD AS PROC_STUS /*작업진행상태*/ , SV1.CNTR_NO , SV1.CNTR_SN , T4.SV_HSHD_NO , 0 AS SV_HSHD_NO_CNT , SV1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , SV1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , CASE WHEN SV2.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD IN ('1112','1113','3460') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS TAIK_YN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ SV1 /*고객서비스AS배정내역*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ SV2 /*서비스작업출고내역*/ ON SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = SV2.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND SV2.WK_OSTR_SN = (SELECT MAX(X.WK_OSTR_SN) FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ X WHERE X.CNTR_NO = SV2.CNTR_NO AND X.CNTR_SN = SV2.CNTR_SN) INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ SV3 /*고객서비스AS설치대상내역*/ ON SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = SV3.CST_SV_ASN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ P1 ON P1.PRTNR_NO = (CASE WHEN SV1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' THEN SV1.WK_PRTNR_NO ELSE SV1.ICHR_PRTNR_NO END) AND P1.OG_TP_CD = (CASE WHEN SV1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' THEN SV1.WK_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD ELSE SV1.ICHR_OG_TP_CD END) AND P1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T4 /*고객서비스수행내역*/ ON SV1.CNTR_NO = T4.CNTR_NO AND SV1.CNTR_SN = T4.CNTR_SN WHERE 1=1 AND SV1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD != '20' AND SV1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) UNION ALL (/*B/S작업 미완료 건*/ SELECT /*+ LEADING(SV1) USE_NL(SV1 SV2 SV3 P1) INDEX(SV2 PK_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ) */ 'BY' GUBUN , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD',SUBSTR(SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO, 0,1)) AS SV_TP /*유형*/ , SV1.CNFM_PSIC_ASN_DT || SV1.CNFM_PSIC_ASN_HH AS RCP_DT /*접수(배정)일자*/ , TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(SV1.ASN_OJ_YM,5,2)) || '월BS' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', SV1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD) AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF /*접수(배정)내역*/ , NVL2(SV1.VST_CNFMDT, SV1.VST_CNFMDT || SV1.VST_CNFM_HH, '') AS REQ_DT /*요청약속일자*/ , (CASE WHEN SV1.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD NOT IN ('00','01') THEN SV1.ARV_DT || SV1.ARV_HH ELSE '' END) AS VST_FSH_DT /*처리일자*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WK_PRGS_STAT_CD', SV1.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD) AS WK_PRGS_STAT /*처리결과*/ , '' AS AS_CAUS /*처리내역*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RTNGD_PROCS_TP_CD', SV2.RTNGD_PROCS_TP_CD) AS RTNGD_PROCS_TP /*반품처리정보*/ , SV2.OSTR_CONF_DT AS FST_VST_FSH_DT/*폐기일자:출고확인일자*/ , (SELECT NVL(X.NEW_ADR_ZIP, X.OLD_ADR_ZIP) FROM TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS X WHERE X.ADR_ID = SV3.ADR_ID) AS ZIP_NO /*우편번호*/ , NVL2(P1.OG_TP_CD, F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MNGR_DV_CD', DECODE(P1.OG_TP_CD, 'W06', '2','1')), '') AS OG_TP /*구분(담당자)*/ , CASE WHEN P1.OG_TP_CD = 'W06' THEN P1.OG_NM ELSE P1.OG_CD END AS OG_NM/*소속(담당자)*/ , P1.PRTNR_NO AS PRTNR_NO /*사번(담당자)*/ , P1.PRTNR_KNM AS PRTNR_NM /*성명(담당자)*/ , (SELECT CASE WHEN P1.PRTNR_NO = '99992' THEN '1588-4113' ELSE X.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO END FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS X WHERE X.OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = P1.PRTNR_NO) AS CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대지역전화번호(담당자)*/ , (SELECT CASE WHEN P1.PRTNR_NO = '99992' THEN '' ELSE X.MEXNO_ENCR END FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS X WHERE X.OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = P1.PRTNR_NO) AS MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대전화국번호암호화(담당자)*/ , (SELECT CASE WHEN P1.PRTNR_NO = '99992' THEN '' ELSE X.CRAL_IDV_TNO END FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS X WHERE X.OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND X.PRTNR_NO = P1.PRTNR_NO) AS CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대개별전화번호(담당자)*/ , (SELECT X.BLD_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ X WHERE X.OG_ID = P1.OG_ID AND X.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM')) AS BLD_NM /*소속빌딩(담당자)*/ , '' AS BC_NO /*작업시바코드*/ , '' AS IMG_YN /*사진*/ , '' AS IST_ENVR_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치환경사진경로*/ , '' AS IST_KIT_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치키드사진경로*/ , '' AS IST_CELNG_PHO_PH_DOC_ID /*설치천장사진경로*/ , '' AS ASN_DT /*배정일자*/ , SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO /*배정번호*/ , SV1.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD AS PROC_STUS /*작업진행상태*/ , SV1.CNTR_NO , SV1.CNTR_SN , T4.SV_HSHD_NO , 0 AS SV_HSHD_NO_CNT , SUBSTR(SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO, 0,1) AS SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , SV1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , CASE WHEN SV4.VST_DV_CD = '20' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS TAIK_YN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ SV1 /*고객서비스BS배정내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ SV4 /*고객서비스BS대상내역*/ ON SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = SV4.CST_SV_ASN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ SV2 /*서비스작업출고내역*/ ON SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = SV2.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND SV2.WK_OSTR_SN = (SELECT MAX(X.WK_OSTR_SN) FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ X WHERE X.CNTR_NO = SV2.CNTR_NO AND X.CNTR_SN = SV2.CNTR_SN) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ SV3 /*월별고객서비스대상내역*/ ON SV1.CNTR_NO = SV3.CNTR_NO AND SV1.CNTR_SN = SV3.CNTR_SN AND SUBSTR(SV1.ARV_DT, 1, 6) = SV3.MNGT_YM LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ P1 ON P1.PRTNR_NO = SV1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AND P1.OG_TP_CD = SV1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND P1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T4 /*고객서비스수행내역*/ ON SV1.CNTR_NO = T4.CNTR_NO AND SV1.CNTR_SN = T4.CNTR_SN WHERE 1=1 AND SV1.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD != '20' AND SV1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) ) WHERE 1=1 AND (CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN) IN (SELECT #{cntrNo} AS CNTR_NO , TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn}) AS CNTR_SN FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO /* 멤버십 계약번호 */ , BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL WHERE 1 = 1 AND OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '212' /* 멤버십-원주문 */ AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO /* 멤버십 계약번호 */ , OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL WHERE 1 = 1 AND BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '212' /* 멤버십-원주문 */ AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) ORDER BY RCP_DT DESC, NVL(VST_FSH_DT,NVL(RCP_DT, ASN_DT)) DESC, CST_SV_ASN_NO DESC

SELECT GUBUN /*구분*/ , CNTR_DTL /*계약상세번호*/ , CST_NM /*고객명*/ , PD_NM /*상품명*/ , SDING_CNTR_DTL /*상대고객*/ , ADR_ZIP /*우편번호*/ , LOCARA_TNO /*전화번호 - 지역전화번호*/ , EXNO_ENCR/*전화번호 - 전화국번호암호화*/ , IDV_TNO/*전화번호 - 개별전화번호*/ , CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대전화번호 - 휴대지역전화번호*/ , MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대전화번호 - 휴대전화국번호암호화*/ , CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대전화번호 - 휴대개별전화번호*/ , REL_TP_CD1 , REL_TP_CD2 FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT V1.*, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY CNTR_DTL ORDER BY GUBUN) AS RN FROM ( SELECT (CASE WHEN P2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '92' AND P1.PD_NM LIKE '%새싹재배기%' AND (SC1.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '215' OR SC2.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '215') THEN '1+1 디바이스' WHEN P2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '11' AND P1.PD_NM LIKE '%새싹씨앗%' AND (SC1.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '215' OR SC2.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '215') THEN '1+1 씨앗' WHEN P2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '92' AND P1.PD_NM LIKE '%새싹재배기%' AND (SC1.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '22W' OR SC2.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '22W') THEN '패키지디바이스' WHEN P2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '11' AND P1.PD_NM LIKE '%새싹씨앗%' AND (SC1.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '22W' OR SC2.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '22W') THEN '패키지씨앗' WHEN P1.PD_NM LIKE '%새싹재배기%' THEN '새싹재배기' WHEN P1.PD_NM LIKE '%새싹씨앗%' THEN '새싹씨앗' ELSE F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'PD_GRP_CD', P2.PD_PRP_VAL20, 'ko') END) AS GUBUN /*구분*/ , SV.CNTR_NO ||'-'|| SV.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL /*계약상세번호*/ , SA2.RCGVP_KNM AS CST_NM /*고객명*/ , P1.PD_NM /*상품명*/ , CASE WHEN P2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '92' AND SC2.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD IN ('214', '216') THEN SC2.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO ||'-'|| SC2.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN WHEN P2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '11' AND SC1.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD IN ('214', '216') THEN SC1.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO ||'-'|| SC1.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN WHEN SC1.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD IN ('22W', '215') THEN SC1.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO ||'-'|| SC1.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN WHEN SC2.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD IN ('22W', '215') THEN SC2.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO ||'-'|| SC2.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN END AS SDING_CNTR_DTL /*상대고객*/ , NVL(ADR.NEW_ADR_ZIP, ADR.OLD_ADR_ZIP) AS ADR_ZIP /*우편번호*/ , NVL2(SA2.LOCARA_TNO, SA2.LOCARA_TNO, '') AS LOCARA_TNO /*전화번호 - 지역전화번호*/ , NVL2(SA2.LOCARA_TNO, SA2.EXNO_ENCR, '') AS EXNO_ENCR/*전화번호 - 전화국번호암호화*/ , NVL2(SA2.LOCARA_TNO, SA2.IDV_TNO, '') AS IDV_TNO/*전화번호 - 개별전화번호*/ , NVL2(SA2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO, SA2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO, '') AS CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대전화번호 - 휴대지역전화번호*/ , NVL2(SA2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO, SA2.MEXNO_ENCR, '') AS MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대전화번호 - 휴대전화국번호암호화*/ , NVL2(SA2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO, SA2.CRAL_IDV_TNO, '') AS CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대전화번호 - 휴대개별전화번호*/ , SV.CNTR_NO , SV.CNTR_SN , P2.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS PD_GRP_CD , SC1.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD AS REL_TP_CD1 , SC2.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD AS REL_TP_CD2 FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ SV INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 /*상품기본*/ ON SV.PDCT_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P2 /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON P1.PD_CD = P2.PD_CD AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND P2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL SA1 /*계약주소관계 - 계약주소*/ ON SA1.DTL_CNTR_NO = SV.CNTR_NO AND SA1.DTL_CNTR_SN = SV.CNTR_SN AND SA1.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') AND SA1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MMSS') BETWEEN SA1.VL_STRT_DTM AND SA1.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS SA2 /*계약주소지기본*/ ON SA2.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = SA1.CNTR_ADRPC_ID INNER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS ADR /*주소기본*/ ON ADR.ADR_ID = SA2.ADR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL SC1/*모종 ==> 기기*/ ON SC1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO = SV.CNTR_NO AND SC1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN = SV.CNTR_SN AND SC1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL SC2/*기기 ==> 모종*/ ON SC2.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO = SV.CNTR_NO AND SC2.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN = SV.CNTR_SN AND SC2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND SV.CNTR_NO = (CASE WHEN SC2.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD IN ('22W', '215') AND SC1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO IS NULL THEN '' ELSE SV.CNTR_NO END) ) V1 WHERE (CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN) IN (( SELECT #{cntrNo} AS CNTR_NO , TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn}) AS CNTR_SN FROM DUAL) UNION ALL SELECT CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN FROM ( SELECT BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO , BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN , OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO AS P_CNTR_NO , OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN AS P_CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL /* 계약관계 - 본 계약번호 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNTR_REL_DTL_CD IN ('214', '216','215', '22W') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MMSS') BETWEEN VL_STRT_DTM AND VL_END_DTM AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO , OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN , BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO AS P_CNTR_NO , BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN AS P_CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL /* 계약관계 - 연계 계약번호 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNTR_REL_DTL_CD IN ('214', '216', '215', '22W') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MMSS') BETWEEN VL_STRT_DTM AND VL_END_DTM AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE 1=1 AND P_CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND P_CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} ) ) V2 WHERE 1=1 AND RN = '1' AND ( REL_TP_CD1 IN ('214', '216', '215', '22W') OR REL_TP_CD2 IN ('214', '216', '215', '22W')) ORDER BY CNTR_DTL

SELECT (SELECT X.CD_VAL_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_CODE X WHERE X.CDSET_ID='CSEL_STS_CD' AND X.USE_FG='Y' AND X.CD_VAL = CC.CSEL_STS_CD) AS CSEL_STS /*처리상태*/ , CC.CNSL_DT AS CNSL_ST_DT /*접수일자*/ , CC.CNSL_ED_DT AS CNSL_ED_DT /*처리일자*/ , (SELECT X.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_CLASS_A X WHERE X.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD = CC.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD AND X.JOB_CD = CC.JOB_CD) AS CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD /*상담분류(대)*/ , (SELECT X.CNSL_TP_MCSF_CD_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_CLASS_B X WHERE X.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD = CC.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD AND X.CNSL_TP_MCSF_CD = CC.CNSL_TP_MCSF_CD AND X.JOB_CD = CC.JOB_CD) AS CNSL_TP_MCSF_CD /*상담분류(중)*/ , (SELECT X.CNSL_TP_LCSF_CD_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_CLASS_C X WHERE X.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD = CC.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD AND X.CNSL_TP_MCSF_CD = CC.CNSL_TP_MCSF_CD AND X.CNSL_TP_LCSF_CD = CC.CNSL_TP_LCSF_CD AND X.JOB_CD = CC.JOB_CD ) AS CNSL_TP_LCSF_CD /*상담분류(소)*/ , (SELECT X.USER_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_USER X WHERE X.USER_ID = CC.MOD_USER_ID) AS PCP_NM /*처리자*/ , (SELECT X.CD_VAL_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_CODE X WHERE X.CDSET_ID='CSEL_RST_CD' AND X.USE_FG='Y' AND X.CD_VAL = CC.CSEL_RST_CD) AS CSEL_RST_CD /*처리구분*/ , (SELECT X.CD_VAL_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_CODE X WHERE X.CDSET_ID='CUST_RESP_CD' AND X.USE_FG='Y' AND X.CD_VAL = CC.CUST_RESP_CD) AS CUST_RESP /*고객반응*/ , (SELECT X.CD_VAL_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_CODE X WHERE X.CDSET_ID='CLNT_DV_CD' AND X.USE_FG='Y' AND X.CD_VAL = CC.CLNT_DV_CD) AS CLNT_DV_NM /*의뢰자*/ , CNSL_CN /*상담내용*/ FROM CCSDBS.TB_WELLS_COUNSEL CC WHERE 1=1 AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} ORDER BY CC.CNSL_DT DESC

SELECT TA.PSUMINAMT /*입금액(전월)*/ , TB.CSUMINAMT /*입금액(당월)*/ , TA.PSUMINAMT+TB.CSUMINAMT AS TSUMINAMT /*입금액(합계)*/ , TC.PDLYAMT AS PDLYAMT /*연체금액(전월)*/ , TC.CDLYAMT AS CDLYAMT /*연체금액(당월)*/ , TC.TLCMAMT AS TDLYAMT /*연체금액(합계)*/ FROM (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD = '1' THEN RVE_AMT ELSE -RVE_AMT END), 0) PSUMINAMT FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL /*수납상세 KWMART.LC3300P*/ WHERE 1=1 AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND SUBSTR(RVE_DT,1,6) = TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYYMM')) AND RVE_DV_CD = '03' /*월납입액(할부금, 렌탈료)*/ ) TA, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD = '1' THEN RVE_AMT ELSE -RVE_AMT END), 0) CSUMINAMT FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL /*수납상세 KWMART.LC3300P*/ WHERE 1=1 AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND SUBSTR(RVE_DT,1,6) = TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYYMM')) AND RVE_DV_CD = '03' /*월납입액(할부금, 렌탈료)*/ ) TB, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(BTD_DLQ_AMT), 0) PDLYAMT , COALESCE(SUM(THM_OC_DLQ_AMT-THM_DLQ_DP_SUM_AMT+THM_DLQ_RFND_SUM_AMT), 0) CDLYAMT , COALESCE(SUM(EOT_DLQ_AMT), 0) TLCMAMT FROM TB_CBCL_DLQ_BAS /**연체기본 KWMART.LC5000P*/ WHERE 1=1 AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND PERF_YM = TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYYMM')) ) TC
